document.full_text: countries are close to a deal to speed up their response to the next flu pandemic by sharing virus samples in return for access to affordable vaccines, diplomats at the world health organization said on tuesday.
document.title: deal near on flu virus-sharing, vaccines: diplomats
lines_and_colors: countries are close to a deal to speed up their response to the next flu pandemic by sharing virus samples in return for access to affordable vaccines, diplomats at the world health organization said on tuesday.
